segment.source: Review this list of tasks and references before you create and deploy your Internet Explorer 11 custom install packages.
segment.target: Review this list of tasks and references before you create and deploy your Internet Explorer 11 custom install packages.

segment.source: Tasks and references to consider before creating and deploying custom packages using IEAK 11 (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Review this list of tasks and references to help you use the Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) to set up, deploy, and manage Internet Explorer 11 in your company.
segment.target: Review this list of tasks and references to help you use the Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) to set up, deploy, and manage Internet Explorer 11 in your company.
